## kernel2 variable

HOF subdiv kernel function for computing 2 split points from 2 source points, using weighted summation (thi.ng/vectors/addW2)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
kernel2: ([ua, ub]: number[], [va, vb]: number[]) => ([a, b]: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>[]) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec[]
```
